content: Presently, streams are ordered in alphabetical order. How about arranging them in the order of one's activity level? Most frequently visited would always be on top. Your views?

There's some complexity involved here, there have been a few discussions about rearranging the stream names in the left side bar, over all I believe alphabetic was decided upon for simplicity and uniformity, you can probably find the conversations if you search through the issue tracker on github.
One challenge with sorting by activity is that it makes finding a specific stream much harder, since your eyes can't scan efficiently.
So if we supported that, we'd do it as an easily toggled option.

Hello to all.
Presently, streams are ordered in alphabetical order.
Is it possible to make channels with activity on top?
So that when the stream receives a message, he rises higher.
Thanks
@Ivan Mihalevich Have you tried out our Recent Topics feature? That might address part of your concerns. You can use the hotkey "t" to launch it.
